thread.title: Ground News - Snowfall affects evening commute in GTA, Hamilton, parts of eastern Ontario
thread.title_full: Ground News - Snowfall affects evening commute in GTA, Hamilton, parts of eastern Ontario

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Snowfall affects evening commute in GTA, Hamilton, parts of eastern Ontario
text: TORONTO — Commuters across the Greater Toronto Area and parts of eastern Ontario had to contend with blowing snow and slippery sidewalks while heading home Friday evening as a blast of wintery weather hit parts of the province.
